>
[Hex Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=1583) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your patron's teachings have allowed you to achieve a deeper focus. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you [Refocused](/Actions.aspx?ID=71), you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

<title level="2">Hex Focus leads to...</title>
[Hex Wellspring](/Feats.aspx?ID=1588)
